coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the can reads 'S.G.C. Provisions'
coreAttributes.name: Blue Raspberry Energy Drink
coreAttributes.description: A can of TurboFlow, a carbonated fruit flavored energy drink. The label shows a stylized dragonfly-morphs dancing around each other.

useDescriptions.selfUse: After opening it, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of energy drink up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. The smell of fresh fruit and hint of something metallic rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the tingly liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] much more refreshed, but also more than a little antsy.
